import React, { Component } from 'react' import { MDBContainer, MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarBrand, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavbarToggler, MDBCollapse, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBIcon } from 'mdbreact'; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios' export default class Particulier extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { collapse: false, atelier:"" }; this.onClick = this.onClick.bind(this); } onClick() { this.setState({ collapse: !this.state.collapse, }); } componentDidMount() { this.getAtelier() } getAtelier() { axios.get("http://localhost:8080/getAtelier") .then(resp => { this.setState({atelier:resp.data}) console.log(resp); }).catch(err => { console.log(err); }) } render() { const bgPink = { backgroundColor: '#e91e63' } const container = { height: 1300 } return (
